results.name: Triangle T(n, k) read by rows: binomial(2n, 2k+1).
comment: A subset of Pascal's triangle A007318 with only even elements.
reference: A. T. Benjamin and J. J. Quinn, Proofs that really count: the art of combinatorial proof, M.A.A. 2003, id. 224.
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Feb 06 2005
